summary: THE FRONT PASSENGER DOOR HANDLE/LOCK WAS DEFECTIVE.  THIS CAUSED THE DOOR TO OPEN (EVEN IF LOCK) WHEN THE PASSENGER ROLLED THE WINDOW DOWN.  THIS PROBLEM WAS REPAIRED ONCE UNDER RECALL (93V-174000).  MAZDA STATED THAT SINCE THEY REPAIRED IT ONCE THEY ARE NOT LEGALLY OBLIGATED TO REPAIR IT AGAIN.  *TS   *NLM
